snippet.textDisplay:
Hey Daniel, I know you probably won't see this because I'm not really that popular of a person but.. I want you to know that even though you probably made some mistakes everyone does your a human being so it's not entirely your fault that this happened, I know it's not really my place to apologize for your other fans who have gotten a little out of hand and have communicated death threats and other kinds of threats towards you but I want you to know that some of us although we dislike some of the things that have happened I want you to know that we still care about you so if you ever need anyone don't be afraid to talk to somebody , and yeah some people may disagree with me but that's only natrual, and just hope that in the future all this will be cleared up and everyone can continue doing what makes them happiest, I probably should have looked in your description to see if you have any contact information on there so I'm going to look there and copy and paste this there to send it to you , but I was just very concerned after what I heard about what happened so I figured I'd let you know that you're not alone, with love a faithful fan
Mari 💙💚
snippet.textOriginal:
Hey Daniel, I know you probably won't see this because I'm not really that popular of a person but.. I want you to know that even though you probably made some mistakes everyone does your a human being so it's not entirely your fault that this happened, I know it's not really my place to apologize for your other fans who have gotten a little out of hand and have communicated death threats and other kinds of threats towards you but I want you to know that some of us although we dislike some of the things that have happened I want you to know that we still care about you so if you ever need anyone don't be afraid to talk to somebody , and yeah some people may disagree with me but that's only natrual, and just hope that in the future all this will be cleared up and everyone can continue doing what makes them happiest, I probably should have looked in your description to see if you have any contact information on there so I'm going to look there and copy and paste this there to send it to you , but I was just very concerned after what I heard about what happened   so I figured I'd let you know that you're not alone, with love a faithful fan 
Mari 💙💚

snippet.textDisplay:
To all the people disliking and hating daniel because of Stephen's video: stop.
He even freaking said to NOT go harrass Daniel.
Also, it's not only Daniel's channel, it's Hosuh's channel too. So you're being idiotic people not listening to the person you're "defending".
I did the same when Stephen's video came out. But then, I watched it again, and subscribed again to danplan and deleted my comment on here.
Why? Because it's dumb. We did not hear Daniel's part of the story and it the whole thing has surely been missunderstood by a great majority of people.
Sure, Daniel did something sad and dumb. But by harrassing him, you're doing worse.
And it won't even bring Stephen back, it's not even Hosuh's fault if Stephen left Danplan.
So if you're just putting all the hate on Daniel's back, in my opinion, you understood nothing and is doing something that Stephen himself said he didn't want you to do.
I liked Stephen too, and I think it's sad too, but think again.
This is not only Daniel's channel. There is Hosuh, that we all like. You surely wouldn't make him sad because you missunderstood everything, would you?
I think my comment is too big, and nobody will see it sadly, but for those who do see it, I would like you to understand what I'm saying.
snippet.textOriginal:
To all the people disliking and  hating daniel because of Stephen's video: stop.
He even freaking said to NOT go harrass Daniel.
Also, it's not only Daniel's channel, it's Hosuh's channel too. So you're being idiotic people not listening to the person you're "defending".
I did the same when Stephen's video came out. But then, I watched it again, and subscribed again to danplan and deleted my comment on here.
Why? Because it's dumb. We did not hear Daniel's part of the story and it the whole thing has surely been missunderstood by a great majority of people.
Sure, Daniel did something sad and dumb. But by harrassing him, you're doing worse.
And it won't even bring Stephen back, it's not even Hosuh's fault if Stephen left Danplan.
So if you're just putting all the hate on Daniel's back, in my opinion, you understood nothing and is doing something that Stephen himself said he didn't want you to do.
I liked Stephen too, and I think it's sad too, but think again.
This is not only Daniel's channel. There is Hosuh, that we all like. You surely wouldn't make him sad because you missunderstood everything, would you?
I think my comment is too big, and nobody will see it sadly, but for those who do see it, I would like you to understand what I'm saying.

snippet.textDisplay:
Hey, you!

Yes, you!

This is for YOU if you hate Dan!

Don't. Don't hate Dan. Don't hate the channel. Don't hate because hate brings chaos and chaos brings destruction. Everyone makes mistakes, Everyone messes up sometimes. Dan messed up, big time. But that doesn't mean we have to go and hate him. We mess up, but do strangers randomly throw hate comments at you? I don't think so. He is human just like us. Just say goodbye to Stephen who made the right decision to leave this channel (since he doesn't deserve what happened to him. Love you, Stephen 😔❤️) and go on with your day and stop attacking. My goodness...
snippet.textOriginal:
Hey, you!

Yes, you!

This is for *YOU* if you hate Dan!

Don't. Don't hate Dan. Don't hate the channel. Don't hate because hate brings chaos and chaos brings destruction. Everyone makes mistakes, Everyone messes up sometimes. Dan messed up, big time. But that doesn't mean we have to go and hate him. We mess up, but do strangers randomly throw hate comments at you? I don't think so. He is human just like us. Just say goodbye to Stephen who made the _right_ decision to leave this channel (since he doesn't deserve what happened to him. Love you, Stephen 😔❤️) and go on with your day and stop attacking. My goodness...

snippet.textDisplay: Guys, i get that Stephen leaving is sad, Hell he was pretty much my favorite, but lets respect his wishes and not attack Dan. I'm not saying what Dan did is good, in fact it was pretty harsh, but we can't attack Dan for it, no matter how much we want too, especially since Stephen had asked us not too, so please, lets respect Stephen's wishes and not attack anyone.
snippet.textOriginal: Guys, i get that Stephen leaving is sad, Hell he was pretty much my favorite, but lets respect his wishes and not attack Dan. I'm not saying what Dan did is good, in fact it was pretty harsh, but we can't attack Dan for it, no matter how much we want too, especially since Stephen had asked us not too, so please, lets respect Stephen's wishes and not attack anyone.

snippet.textDisplay:
in all honesty, i believe what dan did was really selfish but don't cloud him with hate. most of us have experienced times wherein we're blinded by greed. i get it, what he did was unforgivable to some but please can you all stop saying "we'll attack dan".

as stephen said on his video, don't attack him. he is still human with real emotions.

if i were stephen, i wouldn't want my audience doing the same as my bully. and if i were dan, tbh, i wouldnt want to even step out of my house. no one should be able to experience this.

instead of hate, can we all serve this situation as an awareness instead? not only awareness but a lesson. for dan and for us.
snippet.textOriginal:
in all honesty, i believe what dan did was really selfish but don't cloud him with hate. most of us have experienced times wherein we're blinded by greed. i get it, what he did was unforgivable to some but please can you all stop saying "we'll attack dan".

as stephen said on his video, don't attack him. he is still human with real emotions.

if i were stephen, i wouldn't want my audience doing the same as my bully. and if i were dan, tbh, i wouldnt want to even step out of my house. no one should be able to experience this.

instead of hate, can we all serve this situation as an awareness instead? not only awareness but a lesson. for dan and for us.

snippet.textDisplay:
I feel bad for Hosuh and Stephen. I mean, as Stephen said, he tried so hard into helping DanPlan grow, and make it enjoyable with his editing. And the fact that Stephen said that he stayed FOR Hosuh made my heart melt. I really hope they stay friends and keep in contact, because, let's be honest, they're the ones we stayed for. The fact that Dan has the AUDACITY to say that to Stephen made my resepect towards him drop to 0. He failed to acknowledge the fact that Stephen tried so hard into putting each character perfect for us to enjoy, and subscribed for his humour and personality. He did it so well to the point of hiding his real emotions and putting on a very well thought out fake smile. It hurts. It really hurts. I hope Stephen recovers from this, considering on how long he had to endure this mental torture.

I'm also quite worried for Hosuh. That amazing cinnamon roll tried so hard to make sure everything was good and working, and put effort into his editing for us. I wouldn't be surprised if he was too disgusted to see what Dan said to Stephen, although I'm not entirely sure he knows or not. Regardless, I hope he keeps in contact with our stabby child, because I see no reason for him to cut ties with Stephen.


THANK YOU FOR LISTENING TO MY TED TALK.
snippet.textOriginal:

And the fact that Stephen said that he stayed FOR Hosuh made my heart melt. I really hope they stay friends and keep in contact, because, let's be honest, they're the ones we stayed for. The fact that Dan has the AUDACITY to say that to Stephen made my resepect towards him drop to 0. He failed to acknowledge the fact that Stephen tried so hard into putting each character perfect for us to enjoy, and subscribed for his humour and personality. He did it so well to the point of hiding his real emotions and putting on a very well thought out fake smile. It hurts. It really hurts. I hope Stephen recovers from this, considering on how long he had to endure this mental torture.

I'm also quite worried for Hosuh. That amazing cinnamon roll tried so hard to make sure everything was good and working, and put effort into his editing for us. I wouldn't be surprised if he was too disgusted to see what Dan said to Stephen, although I'm not entirely sure he knows or not. Regardless, I hope he keeps in contact with our stabby child, because I see no reason for him to cut ties with Stephen.


*THANK YOU FOR LISTENING TO MY TED TALK.*

snippet.textDisplay: 2020 marks the end of DanPlan golden age forever.....36 thousand dislikes and the loss of at least 120 thousand subs overnight. The loss of Stephen.....I really shouldn’t say this, because Stephen doesn’t want us to be mean or judge before Dan says anything, but I have to say one thing. Dan, when Stephan asked how many of your view were garnered by him, you said you didn’t know. At least 120 thousand apparently. And honestly I can bet probably a lot more considering there are people who, like me, are trying to stay to what Stephen asked and not disliking or unsubbing or anything like that. I’m really sorry you didn’t have an answer about the numbers, and I’m even more sorry this is the way you had to find out. 120 thousand. At least. I’m sorry, I know my comment is rude, but I had to say it. It was like an elephant on my chest.

snippet.textDisplay: Come on guys, don't dislike or unsubscribe! Everyone worked hard to reach 2 million! Stephen worked hard for us, Hosuh too, and also Jay and the whole DanPlan crew. Please consider all the others who worked really hard to achieve this. They even had 2M merch, they were so happy! If I can't change your mind about Daniel, at least think of the other members! snippet.textDisplay:
I just watched Stephen’s video about quitting DanPlan. I know he said not to attack you, Daniel. And I will respect his wish. So I will not attack you. But I just need you to know that Stephen was much more than an employee. He was part of this channel. Lots of your viewers came for Stephen. He contributed so much to your channel. And this is how you treat him? I’m disappointed. But I can’t do anything to change this.

Edit: I just realized that you have gone from 2 million to 1.98 million. What you did has cause 200 THOUSAND people to unsubscribe. The crowd loved Stephen, and you mistreated him to the point he QUIT. He tried to put in so much effort, he tried so hard to be treated as an equal. The effort he put into the videos, all for nothing?

snippet.textDisplay:
To Dan, why would you let a friendship end. Why did you let your head get so big? Why didn’t you work together with Hosuh and meet in the middle? If you find yourself to be the leader or executive it is your responsibility to listen.

Voice actors get paid a good salary, should we just pay them a minuscule amount to the success?

Reflect on the good nature of yourself. Why you had fun in the beginning and why it’s wrong. In the end it’s the people that make each other happy.

snippet.textDisplay:
We didn't hear Dan's side yet, we don't know what Stephen said back to Daniel, if he said anything.

But It still wasn't right for Daniel to say that Stephen was just an employee.

He helped Danplan so much, his humour brought Danplan together. Even though I love Hosuh and Dan, I stayed for Stephen, his humour evened everything out. Daniel may not of been able to say it but his humour brought the channel lots of views.

Dan messed up and I noticed the channel is already losing lots of subscribers.

Although I'm upset Stephen left, I'm glad aswell, it was probably the best choice for him.

I can't even start to imagine how Hosuh feels, he's been trying to convince Stephen to stay all those 9 months.

If you don't know what's happening; https://youtu.be/RlU32AfEVeU

I'm sorry this was a mess but I had to let it out.. I'm not going to unsubscribe, we didn't hear Dan's side yet.

also uwu ik im dragging it out but someone made an amino for Stephen and please join it if you have amino it would be great :))) http://aminoapps.com/c/ActuallyStephen

snippet.textDisplay:
Guys, you need to stop attacking Dan and flooding this channel with hate. I know it hurts that Stephen has left and that your anger needs to be directed somewhere - but painting Dan out to be this greedy sociopathic monster isn't the way. I know what Stephen said was pretty damning, but I think from Dan's side he was just seeing the logic behind it all and not taking into consideration of feelings and friends. I don't think he meant to hurt Stephen and probably didn't want that fight, I think he was considering how to pay everyone and just put Stephen in a bracket that made sense to him. Don't forget it's not just those three, they have other animators too, Jay now seems to be part of the team again. You have to also consider that this was just a hobby to Stephen at first - so what if from Dan's perspective he didn't think Stephen was serious about it and that he wouldn't care about how much he made - so he gave him less so you could pay others more, then when Stephen wanted more money, he had already divided it in a way that others who did more work that Stephen (in Dan's perspective) would lose money.

There's just a lot of factors to play into it. Stephen was hurt, he at the very least deserves an apology from Dan. And I think it's unfair of Dan to not at least give Stephen a chance to work towards more, instead trapping him in a less than 1% bracket. I feel bad for Hosuh for being trapped in the middle and for the rest of the team who put equal amount of effort behind the scenes and because of Dan's fight with Stephen, will now have their livelihoods impacted in some degree.

I think this isn't a mistake. I think Dan made multiple bad decisions. The only thing I hope right now is that Dan will say his side honestly and without dragging Stephen (though to say that Stephen has absolutely no fault in this whatsoever would be unrealistic. I just think whatever faults Stephen has, wouldn't be enough justification for an unequal pay.)

I think we need to give this time. Let the full story be heard. And instead of flooding hate, make your choice by your subscriptions. Stephen has his channel which you can support, Dan, Hosuh, and the rest will have this channel.

I don't think we need to cancel anyone or destroy a channel because of one man's poor decisions. I think at this point Dan knows he made a mistake and to treat it like he doesn't care about Stephen and the break in friendship isn't hurting him as well is unfair.

I think he took things far too seriously and didn't give Stephen a fair chance or proper acknowledgement. I think hurtful things were said during fights and not all were meant. I don't think they'll resolve it to a point where they can be friends but I hope they can one day be on talking terms again and the hurt can stay in the past.

Anyways, wait for Dan's response before making your decisions. And while making your decision, keep in mind of Hosuh, Jay, and the rest of the animators who didn't do anything wrong to Stephen and are still probably his friends.
snippet.textOriginal:
Guys, you need to stop attacking Dan and flooding this channel with hate. I know it hurts that Stephen has left and that your anger needs to be directed somewhere - but painting Dan out to be this greedy sociopathic monster isn't the way. I know what Stephen said was pretty damning, but I think from Dan's side he was just seeing the logic behind it all and not taking into consideration of feelings and friends. I don't think he meant to hurt Stephen and probably didn't want that fight, I think he was considering how to pay everyone and just put Stephen in a bracket that made sense to him. Don't forget it's not just those three, they have other animators too, Jay now seems to be part of the team again. You have to also consider that this was just a hobby to Stephen at first - so what if from Dan's perspective he didn't think Stephen was serious about it and that he wouldn't care about how much he made - so he gave him less so you could pay others more, then when Stephen wanted more money, he had already divided it in a way that others who did more work that Stephen (in Dan's perspective) would lose money. 

There's just a lot of factors to play into it. Stephen was hurt, he at the very least deserves an apology from Dan. And I think it's unfair of Dan to not at least give Stephen a chance to work towards more, instead trapping him in a less than 1% bracket. I feel bad for Hosuh for being trapped in the middle and for the rest of the team who put equal amount of effort behind the scenes and because of Dan's fight with Stephen, will now have their livelihoods impacted in some degree. 

I think this isn't a mistake. I think Dan made multiple bad decisions. The only thing I hope right now is that Dan will say his side honestly and without dragging Stephen (though to say that Stephen has absolutely no fault in this whatsoever would be unrealistic. I just think whatever faults Stephen has, wouldn't be enough justification for an unequal pay.) 

I think we need to give this time. Let the full story be heard. And instead of flooding hate, make your choice by your subscriptions. Stephen has his channel which you can support, Dan, Hosuh, and the rest will have this channel. 

I don't think we need to cancel anyone or destroy a channel because of one man's poor decisions. I think at this point Dan knows he made a mistake and to treat it like he doesn't care about Stephen and the break in friendship isn't hurting him as well is unfair. 

I think he took things far too seriously and didn't give Stephen a fair chance or proper acknowledgement. I think hurtful things were said during fights and not all were meant. I don't think they'll resolve it to a point where they can be friends but I hope they can one day be on talking terms again and the hurt can stay in the past. 

Anyways, wait for Dan's response before making your decisions. And while making your decision, keep in mind of Hosuh, Jay, and the rest of the animators who didn't do anything wrong to Stephen and are still probably his friends.
